  1. # 2 "asmcomp/arm64/selection.ml"
  2. (**************************************************************************)
  3. (*                                                                        *)

  5. (*                                                                        *)

  7. (*                 Benedikt Meurer, University of Siegen                  *)
  8. (*                                                                        *)

  17. (**************************************************************************)

  19. (* Instruction selection for the ARM processor *)

  21. open Arch
  22. open Cmm
  23. open Mach

  25. ‌let is_offset chunk n =
  26.    (n >= -256 && n <= 255)               (* 9 bits signed unscaled *)
  27. || (n >= 0 &&
  28.     match chunk with     (* 12 bits unsigned, scaled by chunk size *)
  29.     | Byte_unsigned | Byte_signed ->
  30.         n < 0x1000
  31.     | Sixteen_unsigned | Sixteen_signed ->
  32.         n land 1 = 0 && n lsr 1 < 0x1000
  33.     | Thirtytwo_unsigned | Thirtytwo_signed | Single ->
  34.         n land 3 = 0 && n lsr 2 < 0x1000
  35.     | Word_int | Word_val | Double ->
  36.         n land 7 = 0 && n lsr 3 < 0x1000)

  38. let is_logical_immediate n =
  39.   Arch.is_logical_immediate (Nativeint.of_int n)

  41. (* Signed immediates are simpler *)

  43. let is_immediate n =
  44.   let mn = -n in
  45.   n land 0xFFF = n || n land 0xFFF_000 = n
  46.   || mn land 0xFFF = mn || mn land 0xFFF_000 = mn

  48. (* If you update [inline_ops], you may need to update [is_simple_expr] and/or
  49.    [effects_of], below. *)
  50. ‌let inline_ops =
  51.   [ "sqrt"; "caml_bswap16_direct"; "caml_int32_direct_bswap";
  52.     "caml_int64_direct_bswap"; "caml_nativeint_direct_bswap" ]

  54. ‌let use_direct_addressing _symb =
  55.   (not !Clflags.dlcode) && (not Arch.macosx)

  57. ‌let is_stack_slot rv =
  58.   Reg.(match rv with
  59.         | [| { loc = Stack _ } |] -> true
  60.         | _ -> false)

  62. (* Instruction selection *)

  64. class selector = object(self)

  66. inherit Selectgen.selector_generic as super

  68. method is_immediate_test _cmp n =
  69.   is_immediate n

  71. method! is_immediate op n =
  72.   match op with
  73.   | Iadd | Isub  -> n <= 0xFFF_FFF && n >= -0xFFF_FFF
  74.   | Iand | Ior | Ixor -> is_logical_immediate n
  75.   | Icomp _ | Icheckbound -> is_immediate n
  76.   | _ -> super#is_immediate op n

  78. method! is_simple_expr = function
  79.   (* inlined floating-point ops are simple if their arguments are *)
  80.   | Cop(Cextcall (fn, _, _, _), args, _) when List.mem fn inline_ops ->
  81.       List.for_all self#is_simple_expr args
  82.   | e -> super#is_simple_expr e

  84. method! effects_of e =
  85.   match e with
  86.   | Cop(Cextcall (fn, _, _, _), args, _) when List.mem fn inline_ops ->
  87.       Selectgen.Effect_and_coeffect.join_list_map args self#effects_of
  88.   | e -> super#effects_of e

  90. method select_addressing chunk = function
  91.   | Cop((Caddv | Cadda), [Cconst_symbol (s, _); Cconst_int (n, _)], _)
  92.     when use_direct_addressing s ->
  93.       (Ibased(s, n), Ctuple [])
  94.   | Cop((Caddv | Cadda), [arg; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)
  95.     when is_offset chunk n ->
  96.       (Iindexed n, arg)
  97.   | Cop((Caddv | Cadda as op),
  98.       [arg1; Cop(Caddi, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)], dbg)
  99.     when is_offset chunk n ->
  100.       (Iindexed n, Cop(op, [arg1; arg2], dbg))
  101.   | Cconst_symbol (s, _)
  102.     when use_direct_addressing s ->
  103.       (Ibased(s, 0), Ctuple [])
  104.   | arg ->
  105.       (Iindexed 0, arg)

  107. method! select_operation op args dbg =
  108.   match op with
  109.   (* Integer addition *)
  110.   | Caddi | Caddv | Cadda ->
  111.       begin match args with
  112.       (* Shift-add *)
  113.       | [arg1; Cop(Clsl, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  114.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftadd, n)), [arg1; arg2])
  115.       | [arg1; Cop(Casr, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  116.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftadd, -n)), [arg1; arg2])
  117.       | [Cop(Clsl, [arg1; Cconst_int (n, _)], _); arg2] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  118.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftadd, n)), [arg2; arg1])
  119.       | [Cop(Casr, [arg1; Cconst_int (n, _)], _); arg2] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  120.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftadd, -n)), [arg2; arg1])
  121.       (* Multiply-add *)
  122.       | [arg1; Cop(Cmuli, args2, dbg)] | [Cop(Cmuli, args2, dbg); arg1] ->
  123.           begin match self#select_operation Cmuli args2 dbg with
  124.           | (Iintop_imm(Ilsl, l), [arg3]) ->
  125.               (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftadd, l)), [arg1; arg3])
  126.           | (Iintop Imul, [arg3; arg4]) ->
  127.               (Ispecific Imuladd, [arg3; arg4; arg1])
  128.           | _ ->
  129.               super#select_operation op args dbg
  130.           end
  131.       | _ ->
  132.           super#select_operation op args dbg
  133.       end
  134.   (* Integer subtraction *)
  135.   | Csubi ->
  136.       begin match args with
  137.       (* Shift-sub *)
  138.       | [arg1; Cop(Clsl, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  139.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftsub, n)), [arg1; arg2])
  140.       | [arg1; Cop(Casr, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  141.           (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftsub, -n)), [arg1; arg2])
  142.       (* Multiply-sub *)
  143.       | [arg1; Cop(Cmuli, args2, dbg)] ->
  144.           begin match self#select_operation Cmuli args2 dbg with
  145.           | (Iintop_imm(Ilsl, l), [arg3]) ->
  146.               (Ispecific(Ishiftarith(Ishiftsub, l)), [arg1; arg3])
  147.           | (Iintop Imul, [arg3; arg4]) ->
  148.               (Ispecific Imulsub, [arg3; arg4; arg1])
  149.           | _ ->
  150.               super#select_operation op args dbg
  151.           end
  152.       | _ ->
  153.           super#select_operation op args dbg
  154.       end
  155.   (* Checkbounds *)
  156.   | Ccheckbound ->
  157.       begin match args with
  158.       | [Cop(Clsr, [arg1; Cconst_int (n, _)], _); arg2] when n > 0 && n < 64 ->
  159.           (Ispecific(Ishiftcheckbound { shift = n; }),
  160.             [arg1; arg2])
  161.       | _ ->
  162.           super#select_operation op args dbg
  163.       end
  164.   (* Recognize sign extension *)
  165.   | Casr ->
  166.       begin match args with
  167.         [Cop(Clsl, [k; Cconst_int (n, _)], _); Cconst_int (n', _)]
  168.         when n' = n && 0 < n && n < 64 ->
  169.           (Ispecific (Isignext (64 - n)), [k])
  170.         | _ -> super#select_operation op args dbg
  171.       end
  172.   (* Use trivial addressing mode for atomic loads *)
  173.   | Cload {memory_chunk; mutability; is_atomic = true} ->
  174.       (Iload {memory_chunk; addressing_mode = Iindexed 0;
  175.               mutability; is_atomic = true},
  176.        args)
  177.   (* Recognize floating-point negate and multiply *)
  178.   | Cnegf ->
  179.       begin match args with
  180.       | [Cop(Cmulf, args, _)] -> (Ispecific Inegmulf, args)
  181.       | _ -> super#select_operation op args dbg
  182.       end
  183.   (* Recognize floating-point multiply and add/sub *)
  184.   | Caddf ->
  185.       begin match args with
  186.       | [arg; Cop(Cmulf, args, _)] | [Cop(Cmulf, args, _); arg] ->
  187.           (Ispecific Imuladdf, arg :: args)
  188.       | _ ->
  189.           super#select_operation op args dbg
  190.       end
  191.   | Csubf ->
  192.       begin match args with
  193.       | [arg; Cop(Cmulf, args, _)] ->
  194.           (Ispecific Imulsubf, arg :: args)
  195.       | [Cop(Cmulf, args, _); arg] ->
  196.           (Ispecific Inegmulsubf, arg :: args)
  197.       | _ ->
  198.           super#select_operation op args dbg
  199.       end
  200.   (* Recognize floating-point square root *)
  201.   | Cextcall("sqrt", _, _, _) ->
  202.       (Ispecific Isqrtf, args)
  203.   (* Recognize bswap instructions *)
  204.   | Cextcall("caml_bswap16_direct", _, _, _) ->
  205.       (Ispecific(Ibswap 16), args)
  206.   | Cextcall("caml_int32_direct_bswap", _, _, _) ->
  207.       (Ispecific(Ibswap 32), args)
  208.   | Cextcall(("caml_int64_direct_bswap"|"caml_nativeint_direct_bswap"),
  209.               _, _, _) ->
  210.       (Ispecific (Ibswap 64), args)
  211.   (* Other operations are regular *)
  212.   | _ ->
  213.       super#select_operation op args dbg

  215. method! insert_move_extcall_arg env ty_arg src dst =
  216.   if macosx && ty_arg = XInt32 && is_stack_slot dst
  217.   then self#insert env (Iop (Ispecific Imove32)) src dst
  218.   else self#insert_moves env src dst
  219. end

  221. ‌let fundecl ~future_funcnames f = (new selector)#emit_fundecl
  222.                                             ~future_funcnames f
